channel.title: CVE Feed for yetanalytics -- lrs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for yetanalytics -- lrs

item.title: CVE-2024-26140|2024-02-20T21:47:08.027Z -- yetanalytics -- lrs
item.description: com.yetanalytics/lrs is the Yet Analytics Core LRS Library. Prior to version 1.2.17 of the LRS library and version 0.7.5 of SQL LRS, a maliciously crafted xAPI statement could be used to perform script or other tag injection in the LRS Statement Browser. The problem is patched in version 1.2.17 of the LRS library and version 0.7.5 of SQL LRS. No known workarounds exist.
